instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: i have a 820-3462-a board checked voltages and i dont get a green light, yet i get 3.4v on adapter sense. i checked around all fuses to see if power was good and have not found a line with no power. any idea? think it may have sent a spike to the cpu?

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: PP3V42 and PPBUS_G3H voltages? SMC_BC_ACOK present?

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message:
12.28v ppbus_g3h tested at [SIZE=14px][COLOR=#000000]R6905[/COLOR][/SIZE]

3.41v   pp3v42 tested at [SIZE=12px][COLOR=#000000]C6908[/COLOR][/SIZE]

3.42v smc_bc_acok tested at c6900

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: SMC not running. Is SMC_RESET high?

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: smc reset is 3.4v checked on r7000

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: would i get smc_bc_acok if the smc is dead?

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: Either dead SMC or corrosion under it.

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: ok well im 100% sure there is no corrosion under the smc, ive looked over the entire board for some sign of water, but im sure she fried it plugging in a fake air charger. how can i go about getting an smc? i know they are model specific

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: Before we condemn the SMC check for 3V on L7260 first.

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message: there we go, no voltage on L7260

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message:
Q: Is P3V3S5_EN present?
A: Yes, measure resistance to GND on L7260
A: No, Check R7940 and check if SMC_PM_G2_EN is present....

threads.title: customer used a 20$ macbook air charger
threads.message:
Nah, SMC is not running for sure. Get a donor board and swap it. Donors are on Ebay and aliexpress

[url]https://nl.aliexpress.com/item/1pcs-2012years-Faulty-Logic-Board-For-Apple-MacBook-Air-13-A425-repair-820-2936-A-B/32645164137.html[/url]

Get 2 or more, no guarantee the SMC on those boards is good.....
